name: Small Backpack
description_core: A worn canvas pack with quiet seams and room for one more hope.
backstory: Travelers stitch their names inside its lining; the Labyrinth remembers every thread.

name: Iron Sword
description_core: A dependable edge that carries more resolve than shine.
backstory: Hammered from common ore and uncommon patience; it prefers problems it can reach.

name: Wooden Shield
description_core: Knot-grained planks bound by iron, steady as a kept promise.
backstory: It bears dents like old stories—each one a corner turned and survived.

name: Leather Cap
description_core: Supple hide trimmed to keep thought and rain in their places.
backstory: Sweat-darkened and luck-touched, it remembers every narrow miss.

name: Leather Boots
description_core: Quiet steps stitched for long halls and longer chances.
backstory: Their soles carry a map in scuffs; the Labyrinth reads it back.

name: Cloth Armor
description_core: Layered weave that turns blows into rumors.
backstory: Patched with care and a little superstition; it wears lighter than fear.

name: Pickaxe
description_core: A miner's rhythm given teeth; walls hear it coming.
backstory: Swings to the beat of stubbornness; some stones take it personally.

name: Demon Spawner
description_core: An unsettled hinge between here and elsewhere.
backstory: It remembers the shape of visitors and tries to be polite about it.

name: Wooden Chest
description_core: A promise with a lid and a reputation for splinters.
backstory: Hinges creak like old advice; what's inside usually ignores it.

name: Obsidian Ritual Dagger
description_core: A night-slick edge that drinks lamplight and rumor alike.
backstory: Cut a doorway thin enough and something will try to read it.

name: Infernal Grimoire
description_core: Pages that warm the air as you turn them.
backstory: Margins argue with the text; both are convinced they're right.

name: Cursed Skull Idol
description_core: A grin that fits too many doors.
backstory: When it listens, rooms go quiet to hear what it heard.

name: Ashen Pentacle
description_core: Char meets charm in a soot-black star.
backstory: It remembers the shape of smoke and asks every flame its name.

name: Horn of the Abyss
description_core: A call that arrives before it's sounded.
backstory: Blow it in a maze and every corner answers at once.

name: Hellfire Candle
description_core: A flame that looks back.
backstory: Drips write small letters that no one admits to reading.

name: Bloodstone Amulet
description_core: A pulse caught in red glass.
backstory: It keeps time for promises that ran late.

name: Bone Chalice of the Damned
description_core: A toast that never finishes.
backstory: It chills anything poured, even sunlight.

name: Sword of Saint Aurelius
description_core: An oath turned into an edge.
backstory: It prefers to be raised for others, not against them.

name: Hammer of Purity
description_core: A verdict with a handle.
backstory: It strikes like a bell; not everyone hears the same note.

name: Runed War Axe
description_core: Edges that argue in a script of sparks.
backstory: Every notch is a word in a language that prefers action.

name: Demonbane Cross
description_core: A quiet light that goes where it's needed first.
backstory: It travels well between rooms no one can see.

name: Blessed Salt Crystals
description_core: Grains that teach thresholds how to behave.
backstory: They remember shorelines and insist on them.

name: Black Lotus Incense
description_core: Smoke that remembers where it has been.
backstory: Some thoughts are easier to find when the air thinks with you.

name: Chains of Servitude
description_core: Links that remember who carried them last.
backstory: They cling to vows, even the ones no one meant to make.

name: Mirror of Vanity
description_core: A reflection that edits back.
backstory: It shows what the room wants from you—if you let it.

name: Crown of Bones
description_core: Teeth set in a circle the head eventually understands.
backstory: It fits by teaching you why it should.

name: Chalice of Eternal Wine
description_core: A cup that keeps the night topped off.
backstory: Toast once and the moment keeps refilling itself.
